name: Hexlator
tagline: A simple and light-weight hexadecimal color finder.
body:
## Why would I want to use HEXlator?
### Simplicity
HEXlator is one of the easiest and quickest ways to find a hex code. It has a very
clean, simple, and appealing UI. HEXlator even offers a tutorial in Main Menu > More Options.  

### Cross-Platform
Being written in pure Java Swing, HEXlator is Cross-Platform. This means that you can run it on Windows, OS X, Linux, Solaris, and more! All you need to run it is to have Java installed on your system.

### Free
HEXlator is free to use and contribute to with a GNU license. No money, membership, or credit card number needed to download.

## Screenshots
![imgur](http://i.imgur.com/b9PGsHz.jpg)
![imgur](http://i.imgur.com/Cga2teL.jpg)
![imgur](http://i.imgur.com/NDG1sst.jpg)


## Mobile App
There is currently a HEXlator Android app in development to find Hex codes on the go.
